metadata.Title: CVE-2020-6820 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - high
metadata.Description: Under certain conditions, when handling a ReadableStream, a race conditioncan cause a use-after-free. We are aware of targeted attacks in the wildabusing this flaw. This vulnerability affects Thunderbird < 68.7.0, Firefox< 74.0.1, and Firefox ESR < 68.6.1.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
